name: Race of Eminence
description:
WELCOME TO RACE OF EMINENCE

Race of Eminence is a solo project and the first ever game I created. In this game you can pick between 7 different ships, each with an unique special ability and different perfomance stats. To win you must be the first to cross the line like any classic race, but unlike a classic race you must manage your ship's health, ammo and turbo. 

Features:

Different Ships

 

Different Stats and Abilities

Different items to pick up

Repair Tool that the player can store (up to three)  and use to regain Health Points

 

Ammo that the player can pick up to start blasting again

Nitroboost to recharge your Turbo

 

Xpecial Power to reactivate the ship's special ability

Controls

Genre: Racing

Platform: PC

Engine: Unity

Language: English
